title: Black Smoke Motorcycle Club: The Complete Collection
description: Praise for Meg Jackson's bestselling Black Smoke MC series:  "I could not put my kindle down. The story line is awesome and Endo and Naomi are my favorite characters to date. Meg really did a great job on their story. Thank you, Meg, for your talent." ★★★★★ - Jennifer  "Wow, what a story. I can't believe how many times I cried in this book. Triggers and Cass's story will always be one of my favorites." ★★★★★ - Lora  "Great book! Reign and Gabriella will keep you interested. A must read with all the sexy you can handle." ★★★★★  - Cathryn  Adults only.
author: Meg Jackson
